name: The land of the nether world
name_original: The land of the nether world
description:
This is a first person shooting game. Players play the role of soldiers, exploring in the underworld, players are surrounded by the enemy. They can explore nearby. Players can avoid the enemy's attack or kill the enemy to survive.

Control key:

Right click the target

WASD movement

Move left operation

Left mouse button attack

Space jump

Left squat

Mouse control direction

Loading weapons

F take up arms
